ComicInfo.Summary:
Five brand-new stories of the Belcher family! Tina’s erotic friend fiction takes us to the Wild West for a sharp shooter stand-off, Bob makes a profitable prediction, Louise imagines a fantastically unfathomable fort, Linda pitches peculiar perfumes, and Gene presents a musical that is both euphonious and amphibious. From the creative team behind Bob’s Burgers, one of the most popular animated sitcoms on television, as seen on Fox!
Story TitlesTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Trick Shot TinaBurger of the Day Ideas: Fortune Cookie BurgerLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: Who Forted?Letters From Linda: Dear Smellopolis.comGene Belcher Presents: Guys & Frogs, The Musical*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Devin Roth | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Cover | Devin Roth | 2 |
